title: OMG who is the guy that created Jhin's Ultimate Music?
body:
This is it here OMG sweet Jesus who created this masterpiece? and how did Riot get the idea to put a music into this Ulti and how did they come up with this awesome Ulti? 

I am new btw just started playing LoL but I have played over 12,000 hours of HoN and DOTA 2, the only thing I was disappointed in with LoL was the downgraded graphics, but there is a special beauty in its artwork  and the quality of the new Legendary Skins. They seem to add extra graphics in these new legendary skins I hope they make one for Jhin someday. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5b2fdeaeX40

replies.body: You should check out Aurelion Sol's login music, You will feel power overflowing.

This^

Tons of the logins are great. If you have headphones then the Warwick one is _absolutely. Phenomenal._ I also especially like the season 7 (assassin update) one, Yorick, All star- Barcelona, Ekko, and Vel'Koz (and HOLY CRAP HIS TEASER)

Actually shoot Vel'Koz's teaser gives me chills. And I don't even play him.

{{champion:161}} "You seek knowledge, the most valuable resource of all..."


"**AS DO I**"

> [{quoted}](name=Stalinium,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KiFbyXQw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-06-30T16:09:08.668+0000)
>
> This^
> 
> Tons of the logins are great. If you have headphones then the Warwick one is _absolutely. Phenomenal._ I also especially like the season 7 (assassin update) one, Yorick, All star- Barcelona, Ekko, and Vel'Koz (and HOLY CRAP HIS TEASER)
> 
> Actually shoot Vel'Koz's teaser gives me chills. And I don't even play him.
> 
> {{champion:161}} "You seek knowledge, the most valuable resource of all..."
> 
> 
> "**AS DO I**"

Ha thanks for your kind words on Warwick! Had a blast working on his music as well (and happy to read that you're listening on good headphones to check out all the details we put into League music!).

Thanks for playing!

Ed the Conqueror
Bit Rush: Arcade Ahri is my favorite from last year

> [{quoted}](name=Stalinium,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KiFbyXQw,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-06-30T16:09:08.668+0000)
>
> This^
> 
> Tons of the logins are great. If you have headphones then the Warwick one is _absolutely. Phenomenal._ I also especially like the season 7 (assassin update) one, Yorick, All star- Barcelona, Ekko, and Vel'Koz (and HOLY CRAP HIS TEASER)
> 
> Actually shoot Vel'Koz's teaser gives me chills. And I don't even play him.
> 
> {{champion:161}} "You seek knowledge, the most valuable resource of all..."
> 
> 
> "**AS DO I**"

Rek'sai music, too. I sat through that one until it finished. Twice.

This is some classic Utora magic. He and Ed The Conqueror (composer for Jhin) worked together, got what are called "stems" from Ed's composition, and created a new piece of music to work with Jhin's ult.
Hi Trebl. I was wondering if you ever plan on making an extended version of Darius' login screen. It's probably my second favorite piece in the entire game after Jhin's login screen.

Jhin, in my opinion, is the best champion they have ever released thematic wise. Everything, from the music, to his personality, to his lore, to even how he acts in game is just........stunning.

I honestly dont think you will ever find another character that even comes close to Jhin in a pure multiplayer setting, and I doubt Riot can top him any time soon.
Does LoL have downgraded graphics?

unfortunately yes being the oldest MOBA it does have downgraded graphics compared to newer ones like DOTA 2 and HoN however it sort of makes up for it with its incredible artwork but its really only seen in new skins and mainly legendary skins. Most skins still look nothing like their splash art unfortunately but I think Riot is trying to change that.

I checked google images but HoN seems like the worst of the three graphic wise.

DOTA 2 seems to be about the same quality just less saturated and darker colors.

mby turn up your quality?

> [{quoted}](name=Vape Naysh YalI,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KiFbyXQw,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-06-30T15:05:36.916+0000)
>
> I checked google images but HoN seems like the worst of the three graphic wise.
> 
> DOTA 2 seems to be about the same quality just less saturated and darker colors.
> 
> mby turn up your quality?

Not sure what images those were, probably old images I assume. 

This is the newest video with the latest Skins there is a significant difference in quality compared to LoL, in HoN they do not take PC specs into consideration so you will notice the skins look more like AAA designs for a console game like say Mortal Kombat X etc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJWk-rMyDXI

I mean, League used to have downgraded graphics but imo since Riot is working all time on the game it's graphics can be compared to newer games as well, maybe some champion models are outdated but that's really it. Maybe you are playing on low graphics? 

As I said, earlier years of League it had downgraded graphics indeed, but since new map got released it looks pretty decent.

Thanks, CyberArtillery!

Riot TreblMuffin said all there is to know about who's responsible for the Ult sounds.

Utora and myself have collaborated on Jhin, Kled, Rakan, Kindred, Dark Star 2017... He likes to make SFX with music and I like to make music with SFX, so we have tremendous synergy together!

Thanks for listening!

Ed the Conqueror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KiFbyXQw,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-07-01T15:11:44.087+0000)
>
> Thanks, CyberArtillery!
> 
> Riot TreblMuffin said all there is to know about who's responsible for the Ult sounds.
> 
> Utora and myself have collaborated on Jhin, Kled, Rakan, Kindred, Dark Star 2017... He likes to make SFX with music and I like to make music with SFX, so we have tremendous synergy together!
> 
> Thanks for listening!
> 
> Ed the Conqueror

Thanks for making the best sound track ever and the best champion ever. 

Its hard to believe humans can be this good, Jhin is just so perfect I havent seen another moba games with such an awesome guy I listen to your music with my Sennheiser HD 650 and a Little dot Tube Amplifier. 

I wish I could get your music for Jhin in 320k MP3 format or anyother high quality format.
I love your comp team. In my opinion you never did a "bad" music.
His login theme is even better in my opinion, check it out if you haven't already

Ekko's music is still my ringtone 3 years after he came out
On a seperate note, Burning Tides theme
Glad you like the game. Did you take a look at the upcoming SKT Jhin skin ?

I did check his SKT but I am not a fan of it, the only thing I liked about it was they kept the Original Ulti music which I think is the best but I will either go for Blood Moon Jhin or wait for a Legendary Jhin Skin.

> [{quoted}](name=CyberArtillery,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KiFbyXQw,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-06-30T14:33:48.341+0000)
>
> I did check his SKT but I am not a fan of it, the only thing I liked about it was they kept the Original Ulti music which I think is the best but I will either go for Blood Moon Jhin or wait for a Legendary Jhin Skin.

Bloodmoon is nice and so is HighNoon.

If you think that's good, check out Jhin's other music.

Mind of the Virtuoso, his Trailer.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B4-BgDEy2AE

The Jhin Theme is pretty sick as well.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NSQZqVsaKWY
OMG IT'S SO BEAUTIFUL x4!
